Texts.Eng:
A sapient race of Orca-like people.
    
Diet: Omnivore 
 
^orange;Perks^reset;: 
+^green;20^reset;% health, +40% Max Food, ^green;2000 Breath
Resist: ^green;30^reset;% Ice, ^green;20^reset;% Fire and Radiation 
Immune: Wet

^orange;Environment^reset;: 
Gain additional health and energy in ^green;oceanic^reset; biomes 
In water/healing water, you gain ^green;-50^reset;% Hunger Rate, +^green;20^reset;% Poison Resist, and ^green;minor health regen^reset;
    
^orange;Weapons^reset;:
Boltgun: +^green;20^reset; Damage, +^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance,+^green;7^reset; Crit Bonus Damage
Trident: +^green;10^reset; Damage, +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;5^reset; Crit Bonus Damage
Spear: +^green;20^reset; Damage

^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
^red;30^reset;% Electric, ^red;20^reset;% Poison
